comment: She is a great teacher! she does not bash on your opinions and she takes interest in your papers. She will not grade on opinion. which is great. she was awesome! def a good teacher the textbook she picked out was a very good choice. she is a very smart teacher. take her class!

I loved her. She was a great first english professor for a freshman. She expected things of you but also understood that her freshman didn't know what to expect from a college level english class. I really recommend her. Great teacher!
